name: WISH3S
description:
Created for  NaNoRenO 2023.

"Your name is 'Mora',  owner of a magic item store. Your business has for the past few years been less than admirable. But today it will  all change since you are meeting up with a travelling merchant called 'Feu'.  He's trading you an item that is beyond your wildest dreams... For a small price of course."

Small game about my OC's and a magical lamp. 
This Visual novel has 7 possible endings.

CONTENT WARNING: 

Includes light swearing,  body horror,  light violence,  death and sexual/romantic scenes.

Also the humor and writing skills of the creator MurderDuck who is not a native English speaker and never will be.

SIDE NOTE:

I offer different systems for uploading, but the game has only been tested for Windows!! Keep that in mind when downloading the game.
